properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10 v11 c2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: God rest ye frantic autocrat, let nothing you dismay, Remember that the great event is still a month a way, Don't panic yet, there's lots of time, and don't get swept away.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: And sing ye in chorus: "Never again, never again," And sing ye in chorus: "Ne'er again!"

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: God rest ye frantic autocrat, let nothing you dismay, Remember that the great event is still a week away, The music's fine if only they remember how to play.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: God rest ye frantic autocrat, let nothing you dismay, Remember that the great event is still three days away. The feast is planned, the food's been bought, though God knows how you'll pay.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: God rest ye frantic autocrat, let nothing you dismay, Remember that the great event is scheduled for today. The tourney's grand, the rain won't last for very long, they say.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: God rest ye frantic autocrat, let nothing you dismay, Despite the fact that everything is going wrong today. The King and Queen came unannounced and God knows who else may.

verse.name: v6
v7
verse.lines: God rest ye frantic autocrat, let nothing you dismay, The ants have eaten half your food and dragged your tent away Some mundane called the cops and they took all the knights away.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: God rest ye frantic autocrat, let nothing you dismay, It's getting cold, it just might snow. You'd better start to pray. The fire won't start, the food will spoil, so serve it anyway

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: God rest ye frantic autocrat, let nothing you dismay, The feast was grand, though half the court is dying of the plague The revel would have been great but the tavern blew away

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: God help ye, frantic autocrat you'd better run away The Queen is mad Ã± her tent and King have both been washed away. It might be wise to change your name and quit the SCA

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: God help ye, frantic autocrat now hide ye while ye may The gentry loved that damned event that ended yesterday They're asking for another one, the King hopes you'll obey.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: And they're singing in chorus "Do it again, do it again!" And they're singing in chorus "Do it again!"
